name: powder-snow
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.
